body: Hi Nico, I'm not sure if I understand your question right but if you mean how can you run it for every day and then average them you can use branching. It will take longer though. Here is an example. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4Ejr0qlHpqL1ciJ*vX5w7La6imC1BIRO6OA1SG-1MH-09r9JvTRlMHIOo*7CTLVK68Y*S*CIekdn4tF3stdek0BnAx7E2LrW/averageDailySunlightHours.png) Mostapha
